# prefersNonBlinkingTextInsertionIndicator

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the system setting to prefer a nonblinking cursor in editable text fields is on.

## Declaration

```swift
static var prefersNonBlinkingTextInsertionIndicator: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the system setting for Prefer Non-Blinking Cursor is on; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. This preference is relevant for apps that draw custom insertion indicators.

## Reducing animation for text insertion indicators

- **prefersNonBlinkingTextInsertionIndicatorDidChangeNotification**: A notification that posts when the system setting to prefer a nonblinking cursor in editable text fields changes.
